long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT for all sites 是一款强大的 AI 助手插件，能够为您的学习和工作提供各种实用的功能，包括：

1、使用快捷键 ⌘+M 一键启动 在浏览器的任何页面唤起插件~
2、阅读助手 📖：总结文章、查找相似页面、解释概念、为程序员解释代码
3、写作助手 📝：检查语法、改写内容、展开内容、生成广告脚本、编写视频脚本等
4、翻译内容 🔤 ：翻译自然语言 或者编程语言均可


ChatGPT for all sites  还带有各种预设提示模板，适用于不同的网络活动，无论您在浏览任何网站时，ChatGPT侧边栏都可以为您提供帮助，让您更加高效地完成各种任务。 💻💡

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ChatGPT for all sites is a powerful AI assistant plugin that provides a variety of practical functions for your learning and work, including:

1、One-click activation using the shortcut ⌘+M to summon the plugin on any page of your browser~
2、Reading Assistant 📖: Summarizing articles, finding similar pages, explaining concepts, and interpreting code for programmers.
3、Writing Assistant 📝: Checking grammar, rewriting content, expanding text, generating advertising scripts, and creating video scripts.
4、Translation 🔤: Able to translate both natural language and programming language.

In addition, ChatGPT for all sites comes with various preset prompt templates, which are suitable for different online activities. No matter what website you are browsing, ChatGPT's sidebar can provide assistance to help you efficiently complete various tasks. 💻💡
